author: parithosh
content:
pectra-devnet-3 is live! ðŸ˜„

Links in its usually place: https://pectra-devnet-3.ethpandaops.io/

I've attached an interesting peering graph in such a clean/new devnet.

content: Yeah pk has a fix coming in, it basically ignored non-finalized blocks
